data.meta_site_name: Mary Andrews Obituary | April 25, 2024 | Springfield, MA
data.text:
Mary Andrews, 82, of Springfield, Massachusetts, departed this life on Thursday, April 25, 2024. Born in Mt. Ulla, North Carolina, she moved here sixty years ago and was a retired Springfield Police Officer. Mary was a dedicated member of Wesley United Methodist Church.

Pre-deceased by a son, Michael Andrews, she is survived by her husband, Joseph Andrews; a son, Marlon Andrews; a daughter-in-law, Kelsey Andrews; and a host of other relatives and friends.

The calling hour is 10-11 a.m. Tuesday, May 7, 2024, at St. John’s Congregational Church, 45 Hancock Street, Springfield, MA, followed by funeral services at 11 a.m., with burial in Hillcrest Park Cemetery.
